question: What is the theme of the 2018 World Intellectual Property Day (WIPD)?
option4: Powering Change: Women in Innovation and Creativity
answer: Powering Change: Women in Innovation and Creativity
explanation: The World Intellectual Property Day (WIPD) is observed every year on April 26 to highlight the role of intellectual property rights, such as patents, trademarks, industrial designs, and copyright, in spurring innovation and creativity. The 2018 theme is “Powering Change: Women in Innovation and Creativity”.
